channel.title: Sorry im so dumb but
channel.description: um i was wondering if anybody had the ints and the model download for wings and also i need the givemod giveadmin give owner and give hidden and eat command.

item.title: Sorry im so dumb but
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

Quote from; TOM SCAPE BETA
if(command.startsWith(“givehidden”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YourName”)) { // give hidden
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 4;
//yell(name+" Is a hidden mod!");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

ROFL! The hidden mod command is kinda messed up. Because when you make someone a hidden mod. You don’t yell to the server that this person is now a hidden mod. Use common sense people.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:10, topic:294606”]if(command.startsWith("premote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { // give owner String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; if(playerRights == 0){ yell(name+" has been premoted to mod!"); c.playerRights = 1; } if(playerRights == 1){ yell(name+" has been premoted to admin"); c.playerRights = 2; } if(playerRights == 2){ c.playerRights = 3; } yell(name+" Is co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
::premote username

If normal player, premotes to mod
if mod, premotes to admin
if admin premotes to co-owner[/quote]

item.title: Sorry im so dumb but
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

just refracture a code they gave u this will make them demote 1 position from where they are

if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { // give owner String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; if(playerRights == 3){ yell(name+" has been demoted to mod!"); c.playerRights = 2; } if(playerRights == 2){ yell(name+" has been demoted to mod!"); c.playerRights = 1; } if(playerRights == 1){ c.playerRights = 0; } yell(name+" Is no longer a staff member!"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
if this doesnt work post the errors and i am pretty sure it wont lol i just posted to show how you could refracture the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry im so dumb but
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName"))) { // give mod command String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; yell(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

f(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { // give admin command. String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; yell(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

if(command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { // give hidden String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 4; //yell(name+" Is a hidden mod!"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { // give owner String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; yell(name+" Is a Owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

might be diffrent foryour source don’t know lol.
